title: Friends List being wonky?
body:
So apparently my friend was showing up as available (not in game and in green text with her status) when she was in-game and should've been yellow.

Then somehow in my own status, which I never changed, it says my status is "In Queue".

Anyone else getting similar friends list hiccups?

{{champion:74}} Just so the tech support Heimers know.

replies.body: Hmm... It sounds like your client is not properly communicating with the PVP.net service, which is what pushes and pulls play status to everyone else on League. The [troubleshooting connections guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) should address the most common solutions for this. Let me know if that helped you out!

Except the issue happened with almost everyone on my friends list at a certain time.

Apologies for necro'ing this thread.
It's happened again, where the status "Creating Normal Game" seems to have been "baked" into my status now.

I can fix it after the fact no problem. It's NOT a Showstopper bug. But it just becomes annoying to have to re-set your status every other day.

Interesting, I've never heard of this exact issue before. Do you happen to be using the Alpha Client when this happens? Also, did you give those steps in the connection guide a shot to ensure your connection to the PvP.net service is stable?
